citations.desc: Environment enhancement to promote psychological well-being.
citations.narrative:
A developed and documented environment enhancement plan for birds was not available for review at time of inspection.
Failure to create and follow an environment enhancement plan can lead to poor health and psychological welfare of birds.
A species-appropriate plan for environment enhancement is required to be developed, documented and followed in order
to promote the psychological well-being of birds. This plan must also be approved by the attending veterinarian.
Correct by 7 January 2024.
This inspection and exit interview were conducted with facility representative.
n

narrative:
3.154 
   
Environment enhancement to promote psychological well-being. 
A developed and documented environment enhancement plan for birds was not available for review at time of inspection. 
Failure to create and follow an environment enhancement plan can lead to poor health and psychological welfare of birds. 
A species-appropriate plan for environment enhancement is required to be developed, documented and followed in order 
to promote the psychological well-being of birds. This plan must also be approved by the attending veterinarian. 
 
Correct by 7 January 2024. 
 
This inspection and exit interview were conducted with facility representative.
